description: Redevelopment of the site to provide 9 residential units and 211sq.m of B1a office floorspace. The development includes; the demolition of No. 67 Jeddo Road (with the exception of ground and first floor fatade), and the erection of a part 4, part 5 storey building to provide B1a office floor space at ground and first floor level and four residential units on the on the upper levels; retention and conversion of No. 69 Jeddo Road to provide three residential units; the demolition of existing single storey outbuilding to the rear of No. 69 Jeddo Road to provide 97sq.m of communal landscaped garden and the erection of two 3 bedroom semi detached mews houses with accommodation at basement, ground and first floor levels; provision of plant, refuse and cycle storage areas at ground floor level.
